inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppMetrics
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name == 'PageVisitTime'
| summarize SumMax = sum(Max), Count = count() by extract_json('$.PageName', tostring(Properties))
| extend Average = round((SumMax / Count) / 1000)
| project AverageTimeSeconds = Average, Page = replace_string(Column1, 'HMPPS Accredited Programmes -', '')
| order by AverageTimeSeconds desc

content.Query:
AppMetrics
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name == 'PageVisitTime'
| where extract_json('$.PageUrl', tostring(Properties)) contains '/refer/'
| where Max < 600000//Remove any timings greater than 10 minutes
| summarize SumMax = sum(Max), Count = count() by extract_json('$.PageName', tostring(Properties))
| extend Average =  round((SumMax / Count) / 1000)
| where Column1 !contains  'Error'
| project AverageTimeSeconds = Average, Page = replace_string(Column1, 'HMPPS Accredited Programmes -', '')
| order by AverageTimeSeconds desc

partHeader.title: Time spent on Referrals
partHeader.subtitle: Average time spent on each page

inputs.name: PartTitle
inputs.value: Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where userName != 'ACP_TEST'
| extend Action = iff(Name endswith "submit", "Submitted", "Created")
| summarize Count=count() by Action, Date=bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render columnchart with (title="Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day")

content.Query:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
| where Name endswith '/new' or Name endswith  '/submit'
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where userName != 'ACP_TEST'
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend Action = iff(Name endswith "/submit", "Submitted", "Created")
| summarize Count=count() by Action, Day
| render columnchart with (title="Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day")

content.Query:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
| where Name endswith '/new' 
| extend caseload = tostring(parse_json(Properties).activeCaseLoadDescription)
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| summarize Count=count() by caseload, Day
| render columnchart

| where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
| where Name endswith '/new' 
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)

       "Created by PT",

| summarize Count=count() by Action, Day

inputs.value:
AppRequests

| extend Action = iff(Name endswith "submit", "Submitted", "Created")

content.Query:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name !in ('GET /metrics', 'GET /ping', 'GET /health')
| where Name !has ('GET /sign-in')
| where Name !has ('GET /sign-out')
| where Name !has ('GET /assets')
| where Url has ('/refer/')
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where isnotempty(userName)
| where Success == True
| summarize Number_Unique_Users = dcount(userName) by Day
| render columnchart

inputs.name: PartTitle
inputs.value: Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where userName != 'ACP_TEST'
| extend Action = iff(Name endswith "submit", "Submitted", "Created")
| summarize Count=count() by Action, Date=bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)

content.Query:
let searchQuery = 
    AppMetrics
    | where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
    | where Properties has 'confirm personal details'
    | project searchTime = todatetime(TimeGenerated), SessionId
    | order by searchTime asc;
let completedQuery = 
    AppMetrics
    | where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
    | where Properties has 'Referral complete'
    | project submittedTime = todatetime(TimeGenerated), SessionId
    | order by submittedTime asc;
completedQuery
| join kind=innerunique searchQuery on SessionId
| where submittedTime > searchTime
| extend TimeTakenraw = submittedTime - searchTime
| extend TimeTaken = floor(TimeTakenraw, 1s) // Round down milliseconds to zero
| project searchTime, submittedTime, TimeTaken
| order by submittedTime asc

inputs.name: PartTitle
inputs.value: Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where userName != 'ACP_TEST'
| extend Action = iff(Name endswith "submit", "Submitted", "Created")
| summarize Count=count() by Action, Date=bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render columnchart with (title="Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day")

content.Query:
let searchQuery = 
    AppRequests
    | where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
    | where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
    | where Name endswith '/new'    
    | where isnotempty(SessionId)
    | project searchTime = todatetime(TimeGenerated), SessionId
    | order by searchTime asc;
let completedQuery = 
    AppRequests
    | where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
    | where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
    | where Name endswith '/submit' 
    | where isnotempty(SessionId)   
    | project submittedTime = todatetime(TimeGenerated), SessionId
    | order by submittedTime asc;
let timeTakenData = completedQuery
    | join kind=innerunique searchQuery on SessionId
    | where submittedTime > searchTime
    | extend TimeTakenraw = submittedTime - searchTime
    | extend TimeTaken = floor(TimeTakenraw, 1s); // Round down milliseconds to zero
timeTakenData
| summarize 
    avgTimeTaken = avg(TimeTaken)

partHeader.title: Average Time taken to submit referral per day in minutes

inputs.name: PartTitle
inputs.value: Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where userName != 'ACP_TEST'
| extend Action = iff(Name endswith "submit", "Submitted", "Created")
| summarize Count=count() by Action, Date=bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render columnchart with (title="Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day")

content.Query:
let searchQuery = 
    AppRequests
    | where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
    | where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
    | where Name endswith '/new'    
    | where isnotempty(SessionId)
    | project searchTime = todatetime(TimeGenerated), SessionId
    | order by searchTime asc;
let completedQuery = 
    AppRequests
    | where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
    | where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
    | where Name endswith '/submit' 
    | where isnotempty(SessionId)   
    | project submittedTime = todatetime(TimeGenerated), SessionId
    | order by submittedTime asc;
let timeTakenData = completedQuery
    | join kind=innerunique searchQuery on SessionId
    | where submittedTime > searchTime
    | extend TimeTakenraw = submittedTime - searchTime
    | extend TimeTaken = floor(TimeTakenraw, 1s); // Round down milliseconds to zero
// Calculate the first (Q1), median, third (Q3) quartiles, and the mean
timeTakenData
| summarize 
    avgTimeTaken = avg(TimeTaken),
    percentiles(TimeTaken, 25, 50, 75)
| project 
	StatName = pack_array('Mean (average)', 'Median value', 'Inter Quartile Range', 'Q1', 'Q3'),
	 StatValue = pack_array(
    Mean_time_taken = floor(avgTimeTaken, 1s),
    Median_time_taken = percentile_TimeTaken_50,
    InterQuartileRange = percentile_TimeTaken_75 - percentile_TimeTaken_25,
    Q1 = percentile_TimeTaken_25,
    Q3 = percentile_TimeTaken_75)
| mv-expand StatName, StatValue
| project StatName, StatValue

partHeader.title: Time taken to submit referral - statistics
partHeader.subtitle: for the number of days set on the dashboard

inputs.name: PartTitle
inputs.value: Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| where userName != 'ACP_TEST'
| extend Action = iff(Name endswith "submit", "Submitted", "Created")
| summarize Count=count() by Action, Date=bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render columnchart with (title="Number 'referral created' and 'referral submitted' by Day")

content.Query:
let searchQuery = 
    AppRequests
    | where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
    | where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
    | where Name endswith '/new'    
    | where isnotempty(SessionId)
    | project searchTime = todatetime(TimeGenerated), SessionId
    | order by searchTime asc;
let completedQuery = 
    AppRequests
    | where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
    | where Name has 'POST /refer/referrals/new'
    | where Name endswith '/submit' 
    | where isnotempty(SessionId)   
    | project submittedTime = todatetime(TimeGenerated), SessionId
    | order by submittedTime asc;
completedQuery
| join kind=innerunique searchQuery on SessionId
| where submittedTime > searchTime
| extend TimeTakenRaw = datetime_diff("Second", submittedTime, searchTime)
| project Date = format_datetime(submittedTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), TimeTakenRaw
| summarize AverageTimeTakenMinutes = avg(TimeTakenRaw)/60 by Date
| order by Date asc

partHeader.title: Average Time taken to submit referral per day in minutes
